comments:
I20051123-1300

1. change a file which is shared (CVS team provider)
2. close the editor
3. in the Package Explorer: Replace With > Latest from HEAD
==> NPE (see below)

This is caused by the fact that the JavaElementResourceMapper uses "return JavaRefactoringModelProvider.JAVA_REFACTORING_MODEL_PROVIDER_ID;" as model ID but this model has been commented out in JDT UI's plugin.xml.
